title: Confidential Moments
description: I might be the newest player for the Sienna Grey Wolves, but they’ll be bringing home another championship trophy because of me.Yeah, I’m cocky, but I’m that good. So good that women and men both want me. But the only man I want is hiding his true self from the world.Just when I think he’s finally out and proud, everything comes crashing down around us, turning my world upside down.Is the man who holds my heart worthy of a second chance? Or will he turn tail and run when he finds out just how complicated things have become?
author: Laura   John
